Token.Abstract: This class handles the geofencing process. You can retrieve an instance of it by calling getModule:GEOFENCING on your location provider. It provides a way to be notified when location is detected in a certain area (see ISGeofenceZone, defined on Insiteo servers. To use this class, you just have to call setListener(ISPGeofenceListener, and start the location. The listener will then receive notification each time location enter/stay/leave an area.
Geofencing notifications listener.
Geofencing notifications listener.
Boolean use to know if the provider is initialized.
Boolean use to know if the provider is initialized.
Method used to know if a ISGeofenceArea exists with a specified guid.

Parameter.Name: guid
Parameter.Abstract: Corresponding area guid.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the area already exists; otherwise NO.

Token.Abstract: Method used to know if a ISGeofenceArea exists with a specified zone identifier.

Parameter.Name: zoneId
Parameter.Abstract: Corresponding area zone identifier.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the area already exists; otherwise NO.

Token.Abstract: Method used to know if a ISGeofenceArea exists with a specified Zone/Poi association.

Parameter.Name: zonePoi
Parameter.Abstract: Zone/Poi association.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the area already exists; otherwise NO.

Token.Abstract: Method used to know if a ISGeofenceArea exists.

Parameter.Name: area
Parameter.Abstract: Corresponding area.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the area already exists; otherwise NO.

Token.Abstract: Equivalent to addGeofenceAreaWithZoneId:andContent:andEnterEnabled:andEnteredTime:andStayedEnabled:andStayedTime:andLeaveEnabled:andLeaveTime:andDefaultGeoWidth: with the following values defaultGeoWidth = value defined in geoPush.csv, enteredEnabled = stayedEnabled = leaveEnabled = value defined in geoPush.csv and enteredTime = stayedTime = leaveTime = value defined in geoPush.csv.

Parameter.Name: zoneId
Parameter.Abstract: zone identifier.

Parameter.Name: content
Parameter.Abstract: The content for the created GeofenceArea.

Token.Abstract: Equivalent to addGeofenceAreaWithZoneId:andContent:andEnterEnabled:andEnteredTime:andStayedEnabled:andStayedTime:andLeaveEnabled:andLeaveTime:andDefaultGeoWidth: with the following values defaultGeoWidth = value defined in geoPush.csv and enteredEnabled = stayedEnabled = leaveEnabled = value defined in geoPush.csv.

Parameter.Name: zoneId
Parameter.Abstract: zone identifier.

Parameter.Name: content
Parameter.Abstract: The content for the created GeofenceArea.

Parameter.Name: eventTime
Parameter.Abstract: The time used to trigged the geofencing events.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new ISGeofenceArea for the given zone. The area will be constructed with the given parameters.
Token.Declaration: - (ISGeofenceArea *)addGeofenceAreaWithZoneId:(int)zoneId andContent:(NSString *)content andEnterEnabled:(Boolean)enterEnabled andEnterTime:(float)enterTime andStayEnabled:(Boolean)stayEnabled andStayTime:(float)stayTime andLeaveEnabled:(Boolean)leaveEnabled andLeaveTime:(float)leaveTime andDefaultGeoWidth:(float)defaultGeoWidth

Parameter.Name: zoneId
Parameter.Abstract: zone identifier.

Parameter.Name: content
Parameter.Abstract: The content for the created GeofenceArea.

Parameter.Name: enterEnabled
Parameter.Abstract: True if entered event should be enabled.

Parameter.Name: enterTime
Parameter.Abstract: The threshold time to trigger the entered event.

Parameter.Name: stayEnabled
Parameter.Abstract: True if stayed event should be enabled.

Parameter.Name: stayTime
Parameter.Abstract: The threshold time to trigger the stayed event.

Parameter.Name: leaveEnabled
Parameter.Abstract: True if leave event should be enabled.

Parameter.Name: leaveTime
Parameter.Abstract: The threshold time to trigger the leave event.

Parameter.Name: defaultGeoWidth
Parameter.Abstract: The default geofence depth.

Token.Abstract: Equivalent to addGeofenceAreaWithZonePoi:andContent:andEnterEnabled:andEnteredTime:andStayedEnabled:andStayedTime:andLeaveEnabled:andLeaveTime:andDefaultGeoWidth: with the following values defaultGeoWidth = value defined in geoPush.csv, enteredEnabled = stayedEnabled = leaveEnabled = value defined in geoPush.csv and enteredTime = stayedTime = leaveTime = value defined in geoPush.csv.

Parameter.Name: zonePoi
Parameter.Abstract: Related Zone/Poi association (could be nil).

Parameter.Name: content
Parameter.Abstract: The content for the created GeofenceArea.

Token.Abstract: Equivalent to addGeofenceAreaWithZonePoi:andContent:andEnterEnabled:andEnteredTime:andStayedEnabled:andStayedTime:andLeaveEnabled:andLeaveTime:andDefaultGeoWidth: with the following values defaultGeoWidth = value defined in geoPush.csv and enteredEnabled = stayedEnabled = leaveEnabled = value defined in geoPush.csv.

Parameter.Name: zonePoi
Parameter.Abstract: Related Zone/Poi association (could be nil).

Parameter.Name: content
Parameter.Abstract: The content for the created GeofenceArea.

Parameter.Name: eventTime
Parameter.Abstract: The time used to trigged the geofencing events.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new ISGeofenceArea for the given Zone/Poi association. The area will be constructed with the given parameters.
Token.Declaration: - (ISGeofenceArea *)addGeofenceAreaWithZonePoi:(ISZonePoi *)zonePoi andContent:(NSString *)content andEnterEnabled:(Boolean)enterEnabled andEnterTime:(float)enterTime andStayEnabled:(Boolean)stayEnabled andStayTime:(float)stayTime andLeaveEnabled:(Boolean)leaveEnabled andLeaveTime:(float)leaveTime andDefaultGeoWidth:(float)defaultGeoWidth

Parameter.Name: stayEnabled

Token.Abstract: Equivalent to addGeofenceAreaWithGUID:andCenter:andContent:andEnterEnabled:andEnteredTime:andStayedEnabled:andStayedTime:andLeaveEnabled:andLeaveTime:andSize: with the following values size = 4 * ISGEOPUSHDEFAULTCUSTOMGEOWIDTH, enteredEnabled = stayedEnabled = leaveEnabled = true and enteredTime = stayedTime = leaveTime = ISGEOPUSHDEFAULTEVENT_TIME.

Parameter.Name: guid
Parameter.Abstract: The guid that should be used for the new ISGeofenceArea. Guid can not be null or empty!

Parameter.Name: center
Parameter.Abstract: The center of the ISGeofenceArea.

Parameter.Name: content
Parameter.Abstract: The content for the created ISGeofenceArea.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The created ISGeofenceArea or null if it was not properly created.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new ISGeofenceArea around the given Position. The area will be a square constructed with the given size.
Token.Declaration: - (ISGeofenceArea *)addGeofenceAreaWithGUID:(NSString *)guid andCenter:(ISPosition *)center andContent:(NSString *)content andEnterEnabled:(Boolean)enteredEnabled andEnteredTime:(float)enteredTime andStayedEnabled:(Boolean)stayedEnabled andStayedTime:(float)stayedTime andLeaveEnabled:(Boolean)leaveEnabled andLeaveTime:(float)leaveTime andSize:(float)size

Parameter.Name: guid
Parameter.Abstract: The guid that should be used for the new GeofenceArea. Guid can not be nil or empty!

Parameter.Name: center
Parameter.Abstract: The center of the GeofenceArea.

Parameter.Name: content
Parameter.Abstract: The content for the created GeofenceArea.

Parameter.Name: enteredEnabled
Parameter.Abstract: True if entered event should be enabled.

Parameter.Name: enteredTime
Parameter.Abstract: The threshold time to trigger the entered event.

Parameter.Name: stayedEnabled
Parameter.Abstract: True if stayed event should be enabled.

Parameter.Name: stayedTime
Parameter.Abstract: The threshold time to trigger the stayed event.

Parameter.Name: leaveEnabled
Parameter.Abstract: True if leave event should be enabled.

Parameter.Name: leaveTime
Parameter.Abstract: The threshold time to trigger the leave event.

Parameter.Name: size
Parameter.Abstract: The size for the square.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The created GeofenceArea or nil if it was not properly created.

Token.Abstract: Method used to remove a ISGeofenceArea according to its guid.

Parameter.Name: guid
Parameter.Abstract: Corresponding area guid to remove.

Token.Abstract: Method used to remove a ISGeofenceArea according to a zone identifier.

Parameter.Name: zoneId
Parameter.Abstract: Corresponding zone identifier to remove from.

Token.Abstract: Method used to remove a ISGeofenceArea according to a Zone/Poi association.

Parameter.Name: zonePoi
Parameter.Abstract: Corresponding Zone/Poi association to remove from.

Token.Abstract: Method used to remove a ISGeofenceArea.

Parameter.Name: area
Parameter.Abstract: Area to remove.
